text: Hamba mndewa nakauza, “Chila chilaga chiwele na ilingo lya kukumbuchila chondilinguchona, ndo kwa chiwalo cha whaani?” Wanhu wa muji nawalonga, “Awu ndo ulajilo wa chilaga cha munhu wa Nguluwi yawele nakoya kulawa Yuda, yawele nakalonga kuwala honhu ha kulavila nhambiko ha ako Beteli, mbuli zizila zouziditile lehano.”
